footer_logo-text: Premium quality menswear focused on exceptional materials and perfect fit.
subscribe-text: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.
about.title: About AORON
about.description: AORON is a manufacturing brand offering stylish, quality and competitive apparel for B2B partnerships. We have been operating since 1991 and specialize in creating men's and women's clothing, focused on wholesale, retail chains and custom orders for brands and boutiques.
about.subtitle: Today we develop two directions:
about.point1: Prince - a classic line of men's suits, proven by time and quality
about.point2: AORON - a modern brand with an expanded assortment: from casual wear to accessories and shoes.
production.title: Production Facilities
production.description: Our company started with a team of 4 people and today employs over 100 people. In the summer of 2025, we are launching a new factory with the ability to scale production - up to 500 employees and 5000+ units per month.
offer.title: We Offer
offer.3: Flexibility to work under private label
why.title: Why Choose Us
why.1: More than 30 years of experience in the market of Uzbekistan
why.2: Full cycle of production - from design to packaging
why.3: Ability to create collections for your brand
why.4: Modern models inspired by global trends
why.5: Favorable conditions for distributors, marketplaces and stores
assortment.title: New Assortment 2025
assortment.1: Men's and women's T-shirts, shirts, shorts
assortment.4: Collaborations and capsule collections to your specifications
cooperation.title: Ready for Cooperation
cooperation.description: We are open to cooperation with:
cooperation.5: Brands willing to produce collections under their name

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To create exceptional menswear that empowers men to look and feel their best, while maintaining a commitment to quality, sustainability, and ethical practices.
values.title: Our Values
values.quality.text: We never compromise on quality. From fabrics to construction, every element is carefully chosen for excellence.
values.sustainability.text: We're committed to reducing our environmental impact through responsible sourcing and sustainable practices.
values.ethical.text: We believe in fair labor practices and work closely with our partners to ensure ethical production standards.
team.title: Our Teams
latestNewsDesc: Stay updated with our latest news and insights.

homeQuality: Quality fabrics. Perfect fit. Timeless style.
